data.text: What is this that thou thinkest to be according to right?
Look up to the sky and see;
If thou hast sinned, what wilt thou do?
And suppose thou art righteous, what wilt thou give him?
Thy ungodliness may affect a man who is like to thee;
They that are oppressed of a multitude will be ready to cry out;
But none said, Where is God that made me,
Who makes me to differ from the four-footed beasts of the earth,
There they shall cry, and none shall hearken,
For the Lord desires not to look on error,
He beholds them that perform lawless deeds, and he will save me:
For he is not now regarding his wrath,
Yet Job vainly opens his mouth,
